Constructs a {{tt|enumerate_view}}.

@1@ Default constructor. [[cpp/language/value_initialization|Value-initializes]] the underlying view {{rlpt|/#Data members|''base_''}}. After construction, {{rlpt|base|base()}} returns a copy of {{c|V()}}.

@2@ Initializes the underlying view {{rlpt|/#Data members|''base_''}} with {{c|std::move(base)}}.
